arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona register veteran superstar just ahead of Rayo Vallecano clash
arts.sum: Barcelona have officially registered veteran goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny ahead of their La Liga clash against Rayo Vallecano. The Polish shot-stopper, who came out of retirement last season to help the team, is now fully available for Hansi Flick. arts.ttl: Barcelona XI vs Rayo Vallecano – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Barcelona travel to the Estadio de Vallecas to face Rayo Vallecano on Sunday evening as they continue their La Liga title defence. The reigning champions head into this fixture following a thrilling 3-2 comeback victory against Levante, where Hansi Flick’s side showed their championship resilience after falling 2-0 behind.
